sentences.en: a black and white striped pattern
sentences.cn: 黑白条纹图案

sentences.en: A change in the pattern of his breathing became apparent.
sentences.cn: 他的呼吸方式明显起了变化。

sentences.en: a dress pattern
sentences.cn: 连衣裙的纸样

sentences.en: A general pattern began to emerge .
sentences.cn: 一个总体模式开始显现。

sentences.en: a pattern of intersecting streets
sentences.cn: 纵横交错的街道图

sentences.en: a pattern of wavy lines
sentences.cn: 波浪形线条图案

sentences.en: a repetitive pattern of behaviour
sentences.cn: 重复的行为模式

sentences.en: He framed his life according to a noble pattern.
sentences.cn: 他以高尚的模式构筑自己生活的框架.

sentences.en: His behavior fits a pattern of violent acts.
sentences.cn: 他的举动符合暴力行为的模式。

sentences.en: It is modeled after the same pattern.
sentences.cn: 它是依照同一模型制成的.

sentences.en: She'll show you how to co-ordinate pattern and colours.
sentences.cn: 她会教你如何搭配款式和颜色。

sentences.en: The dressmaker used a pin to fasten the pattern to the cloth.
sentences.cn: 裁缝用大头针把纸样别在布料上.

sentences.en: The exam system is patterned after the one used in Japan.
sentences.cn: 这种考试制度是仿效日本建立的。

sentences.en: The jumper has a geometrical pattern on it.
sentences.cn: 套头衫上有几何图案.

sentences.en: The kinked line in chart 1 represents this pattern.
sentences.cn: 图表1中的曲线表现了这一模式。

sentences.en: the radial pattern of public transport facilities
sentences.cn: 呈辐射状分布的公共交通设施

sentences.en: The research content is the pattern design of upholstery fabrics.
sentences.cn: 研究内容是家用纺织品图案设计.

sentences.en: The restructuring of the pattern of consumption in Britain also lagged behind.
sentences.cn: 在消费结构重组方面，英国也落后于人。

sentences.en: The shirts were printed with a paisley pattern.
sentences.cn: 这些衬衫上印着佩斯利旋纹图案。

sentences.en: Their descriptions seemed to follow a set pattern (= always develop in the same way ) .
sentences.cn: 他们的描述似乎依据固定的模式。

sentences.en: There's a floral pattern on the curtain.
sentences.cn: 窗帘上有花卉图案.

sentences.en: Weather patterns have changed in recent years.
sentences.cn: 气候模式近年已经发生了变化。

words.tran_cn: 制模师，模型制造者；打样师；花样图案设计者；翻砂工
形成图案（pattern的过去分词）；摹制；复写

phrases.tran_cn: 基本模型；衣服基本纸型
设计模式；设计范式；设计样式
分布格局，分布类型；分布型式，分布型；分配结构
流型，流动型态；活动模；流线谱
n. 模型设计，图案设计
辐射方向图，辐射图；辐射高温计
空间格局，空间形态；分布类型，空间模式

trans.tran_cn: 模式，范例，图案，模型，样品
trans.tran_en: the regular way in which something happens, develops, or is done
to be designed or made in a way that is copied from something else

trans.tran_cn: 仿制， 模仿， 使照…样子
trans.tran_en: to be designed or made in a way that is copied from something else
